attributes.action: lower the number of signatures required to get a reply from the Prime Minister.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government has set a miminum of 200 signatures except in certain cases to get a reply.
This limits the chances of a reply, the limit should be set at a more realistic level such as 50. This lower level is still high enough to show that the petition is supported but low enough to give a fairer chance of a reply.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
